name: The Follower (rosegrace)
description:
The Follower is a story of growth through progression of space and age, with a focus on the different ways one can reflect.

Play as a deer as you traverse through a world of all elements, real and fantasy. You age with each level, and gain more insight on who your reflection really is as you advance through the world.

Credits:

Malbers Animations: Deer assets

111%: LowPoly Environment assets

EBRU DOGAN: Environment assets

B&J STUDIO: Rocks and floating mountains
